top-bar.text-before: Hello! It is a tracker of eco habits. Please
top-bar.text-after: if you are already with us.

header.caption: A new way to cultivate useful habits
header.content: In Ukraine, every person uses more than 500 disposable bags and about 70 paper cups every year. It is enough to bring an eco-bag and your cup with you and this will help to save the lives of 3 dolphins, one turtle and to keep the oceans clean for the next generation.

stats.bag-question: And how many packages you did not take today?
stats.cup-question: And how many cups you did not throw away today?
stats.cup-link: places that make a discount on a drink in your cup

empty-state.no-news-advice: We couldn't find any more news. Please change filters to get another result.

subscription.caption: Receive interesting news
subscription.content: Subscribe for our newsletter and always be up to date with news and updates
subscription.subscription-error: Error, maybe you are already subscribed

search-not-found.not-found-text: We couldn't find results for '{{searchQuery}}' Please change the search.
search-not-found.choose-alternative: Maybe you can find some interesting stuff here:
search-not-found.alternative-description-news: Find the latest news, events and initiatives here. Find news and create ones.
search-not-found.alternative-description-tips: How to sort garbage? Where to find eco stuff? And many other useful stuff for being eco friendly.

welcome.description: GreenCity - a platform to develop and maintain sustainable habits for eco-friendly living. The application is available in web and mobile versions.
welcome.keywords: best task planner, event planner, project planner, task scheduler, the best task planner, eco planner, task tracker, to do planner, eco tips, useful habits, sustainable eco habits, daily eco habits, habits for every day, eco products, live green
welcome.title: Home

map.keywords: Find information about local establishments, view maps, and get directions on Google Maps.
map.title: Map

about.description: The mission of the GreenCity app. The purpose of the project.
about.keywords: eco products, eco lifestyle, eco habits
about.title: About us

news.description: Eco News. All the latest events about ecology.
news.keywords: eco news, ecological events, ecology news, trainings
news.title: Eco news

block-1.text:
GreenCity project addresses the challenge of significant changes in behaviours and lifestyles
of Lviv citizens

block-2.text:
Is to help people get sustainable eco habits in
an easy and fun way and gain support of the likeminded people.

block-1.header: I don’t have time to look for eco stores
block-1.text: We will help you to find eco places near to your homes and offices. And we will tell you about discounts.

block-2.header: I don’t know how to do better for the environment
block-2.text: You will get useful information from our Tips & Tricks section and get inspired with list of possible eco habits.

block-3.text: With us you may find like minded people, with whom you can easily share purchases (wholesale).

block-4.header: I can do nothing to change the situation
block-4.text: You may get inspired with stories of other people who gained eco habits and changes their lives.

block-5.header: I don’t feel support from family and society
block-5.text: With our help you may find this support in our community.

post-news-loader.text-2: Your news is loading to the website. Please wait until the page refreshes

create-news.title: Create news
create-news.form-description: Please provide as many details as you can - place and time of the event, the goal of gathering, etc. You can come back and update news anytime after publishing.

create-news.source-tooltip-1: Please add the link of original article/news/post.
create-news.content-placeholder: e.g. Short description of news, agenda for event
